content.title: BaguioへLa Unionからちょうど1時間で行くことができます - 女性ネットワーク
content.desc: IMAGE Charlene J. Owen For those of you who are still looking for the perfect place to spend your holidays, you might want to consider heading north this time. Thanks to the newly opened Anduyan Bridge and the Aringay-Tubao Alternate Road, going to Baguio from La Union and vice versa just got so much easier, which means you'll get the most out of that long drive north! DPWH Secretary Mark Villar / Facebook Inaugurated on November 26 by the Department of Public Works and Highways, the bridge and the complementing alternate road in La Union will cut the travel time from Tuba, La Union to Ben...

content.title: 自動車運転手はバギオに行く新しい道を使うことを勧めました - サンスターフィリピン
content.source_nm: サンスターフィリピン
content.desc: TOURISTS going to and coming out of Baguio City and Benguet province are advised to take the newly opened road in Tuba to evade traffic. This, after the Department of Public Works and Highways inaugurated the Tubao-Nangalisan Road in Tuba as an alternate route going to Benguet and Baguio City. With the upcoming Yuletide season, Tuba Municipal Police Station Police Chief Inspector James Acod stated with the newly opened route, travel time from Tubao in La Union to Baguio City is reduced to between 45 minutes and one hour. On December 11, he said there will be a joint cluster meeting together...

content.title: コルディジェラのインフレ率は10月に5.2％に上昇 - サンスター・フィリピン
content.source_nm: サンスターフィリピン
content.desc: HEADLINE inflation in the Cordillera Administrative Region (CAR) accelerated to 5.2 percent in October 2018, higher than the 5.0 percent in the previous month and the 1.9 percent a year ago. Among the provinces in the region, Kalinga province posted the highest inflation rate at 8.8 percent, the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA) regional office in CAR reported. It was followed by Apayao with 8.4 percent and Ifugao with 5.9 percent. Apayao posted the fastest year-on-year acceleration rate as inflation increased by 8.2 percentage points compared to the 0.2 percent in October 2017. It was ...
